page.title: 06The Sea.
page.content: {Coastguard:}When someone rings 999 and asks for the coastguard,a chain reaction is started.If a plane has to crash land on the beach the coastguard comes to secure it and rope it off to stop members of the public playing around it.We get a flood when the wind blows in one direction for a longtime and then change direction, thus all the water that was pushed into a pile rushes in towards land.We get a lot of pollution caused by oil leaks which are almost impossible to trace.We now have 16 Auxiliary Coastguards and 4 permanent ones.There are a lot of false calls to the coastguards.Sutton does not have many trees because the flood in l953 killed many of them off.We used to have some special sandhills here where you could get lugworms for fishing.
